SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GuiHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GuiHandler
public class GuiHandler extends View
This class handles incoming messages from the server and updates the GUI accordingly. It extends the abstract class `View` and implements various callback methods to process specific types of messages received from the server.
